This website host all materials, and more, covered in a 3 days in-person
course transitionning from _traditional_ top down presentation to a
_more_ active teaching method.

The purpose is multiple:

1. Being able to add or remove element during these 3 days teaching
   allowing more flexibility depending of student needs.
2. 24/7 avalaiblity of material so student can access it whenever and
   wheneverthey want/need.
